name: One-Pot Taco Chili
author: Diana71
summary: Using Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ Taco Rice, this one-pot chili has a fantastic taco taste, with perfect seasonings and ground beef. An easy one-dish meal for the entire family!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
1 (6 ounce) package Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ - Taco Rice
½ cup shredded cheese, or more to taste
½ cup sour cream, or more to taste
directions: Place a heavy pot over medium heat
Add onions and ground beef and cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbled and onions begin to turn translucent, about 5 minutes
Pour in beef broth; add beans, tomatoes, corn and Knorr® Fiesta Sides - Taco Rice
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender, about 7 minutes
Remove pot from heat; let pot stand at least 2 minutes
Serve topped with shredded cheese and sour cream
